name: Stranger Things
summary: A thrilling series about kids in the 80s uncovering supernatural mysteries in their small town.

name: The Witcher
summary: A fantasy series following Geralt of Rivia, a monster hunter, as he navigates a world full of magic and danger.

name: Black Mirror
summary: An anthology series exploring the dark side of modern and future society with twisted, thought-provoking stories.

name: The Crown
summary: A historical drama chronicling the reign of Queen Elizabeth II and the events that shaped the second half of the 20th century.

name: Money Heist
summary: A gripping heist drama about a group of robbers who plan and execute the biggest heist in Spanish history.

name: Narcos
summary: A dramatic portrayal of the rise and fall of notorious drug kingpin Pablo Escobar and the Medell√≠n cartel.

name: Ozark
summary: A financial planner relocates his family to the Ozarks after a money laundering scheme goes wrong, becoming entangled with local criminals.

name: BoJack Horseman
summary: An animated series about a washed-up actor who happens to be a horse, dealing with addiction, depression, and self-destructive behavior.

name: The Umbrella Academy
summary: A dysfunctional family of adopted superhero siblings reunite to solve the mystery of their father's death and prevent an impending apocalypse.

name: 13 Reasons Why
summary: A high school student discovers a series of cassette tapes recorded by his deceased classmate, revealing the reasons for her suicide.

name: Lucifer
summary: The Devil himself abandons Hell to run a nightclub in Los Angeles, where he becomes a consultant to the LAPD.

name: The Haunting of Hill House
summary: A chilling horror series that alternates between past and present, focusing on a family dealing with haunting memories of their old home.

name: House of Cards
summary: A ruthless politician will stop at nothing to conquer Washington D.C. in this political drama series.

name: Daredevil
summary: Blinded as a young boy but imbued with extraordinary senses, Matt Murdock fights injustice by day as a lawyer and by night as Daredevil.

name: The Queen's Gambit
summary: An orphaned chess prodigy struggles with addiction in a quest to become the greatest chess player in the world.

name: Bridgerton
summary: A period drama set in Regency-era London, following the lives and loves of the Bridgerton family.

name: Shadow and Bone
summary: In a world cleaved in two by a massive barrier of perpetual darkness, a young soldier uncovers a power that might unite her country.

name: You
summary: A dangerously charming, intensely obsessive young man goes to extreme measures to insert himself into the lives of those he is transfixed by.

name: Sex Education
summary: A teenage boy with a sex therapist mother teams up with a high school classmate to set up an underground sex therapy clinic at school.

name: Tiger King
summary: A true crime documentary series about the life of zookeeper Joe Exotic and the world of big cat breeding.

name: Mindhunter
summary: Two FBI agents expand criminal science by delving into the psychology of murder and getting uneasily close to all-too-real monsters.

name: Big Mouth
summary: An animated series following a group of teenagers, their puberty struggles, and their interactions with personified hormones.

name: Love, Death & Robots
summary: An anthology series presenting animated shorts that span multiple genres, including science fiction, fantasy, horror, and comedy.
